}} 'Consumed' were a punk rock band from the outskirts of Nottingham, England.
Primarily consisting of brothers Steve and Mike Ford who provided the
songwriting, vocals and guitars. They were signed to Fat Wreck Chords then moved
to Golf Records shortly before the release of their final album [[Pistols at
Dawn (Consumed album)|Pistols at Dawn]]. The band toured the UK, Europe,
Scandinavia, USA, Canada and were also regulars at various surf and skate
festivals in the mid- to late-
1990s. [http://www.fatwreck.de/ukcons.html]

Steve Watson's other bands included Cerebral Fix and Iron Monkey. Baz Barrett's
other bands include Intense Degree and Crippled Black Phoenix. Chris Billam,
Luke Moss and Will Burchell also play in The Blueprint. Wes Wasley's other bands
include One Car Pile-Up, Billy No Mates, The Pissmops, PotKettleBlack, Vanilla
Pod, Descendage.

The track "Heavy Metal Winner" was featured in the 2000 video game [[Tony Hawk's
Pro Skater 2]], and in the HD rendition [[Tony Hawk's Pro Skater HD]] in 2012.
